name: Down To Clown
description:
Intro:

Congratulations! Through a distant relative, you didn’t know you had, you were handed down the deed to Funtasia Circus! Work together with your posse of clowns in order to accrue enough tickets to make Funtasia the best circus ever! But beware of the clowns’ dark secrets…

Instructions:

- Each clown corresponds to their own circus stand, read their bios for hints to where they belong!

- Drag a clown to their stand to put them to work and start earning tickets.

- Spend tickets on stand upgrades to increase your ticket output.

- Use tickets to unlock more stands to put all of your clowns to work!
